About Me

Medical Student at UCSF School of Medicine. Cal alum.

Research

I received my M.S. from the UC Berkeley-UCSF Joint Medical Program focused on clinical image processing.

In the past, I was part of the Klinman Group and ULab at Berkeley.

Interests

My primary research interest is in approaches to generating synthetic imaging data for training clinical decision support systems.
